subject: Question over UK shipping.
description_text:
Hi simsonns Support.

I'm interested in buying the Plus X but I live in the uk. Will i be
affected by import fees to the uk?

Kind regards
Tristan Ferguson

conversations.body_text:
Okay, thank you for the fast response. i'll definitely start thinking about
it more.

Kind regards
Tristan Ferguson

On Tue, 23 Sept 2025 at 12:36, General and sales enquiries <
service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> Please don't worry, there will be no additional charges including customs
> duties.
>
>
>
> ----------Reply to Message----------
> On Tue, Sep 23, 2025 19:34 PM Tristan Ferguson<
> tristanferguson776@gmail.com> wrote:
> Hi simsonns Support.
>
> I'm interested in buying the Plus X but I live in the uk. Will i be
> affected by import fees to the uk?
>
> Kind regards
> Tristan Ferguson

does the hydraulic system come with the Plus X?
